name: Etheredge Aviation & Flight Training Services LLC
about: Etheredge Aviation & Flight Training Services LLC, located at 537 Airport Road in Pell City, Alabama, is a comprehensive flight training institution dedicated to nurturing aspiring pilots. We offer a range of certifications, including the Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, Instrument Rating, and various Flight Instructor certifications. Our programs are designed to meet the highest standards of aviation education, and we also partner to offer a Bachelor's Degree in aviation-related fields. With a team of experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities, Etheredge Aviation provides a supportive and professional environment for students to achieve their aviation goals. For more information, visit our website at www.eafts.com or contact us at (205) 218-3334. We are committed to helping you soar to new heights in the aviation industry.
